trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conjunto de métodos e propriedades que você pode usar para medir com precisão o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance can measure elapsed time for one interval, or the total of elapsed time across multiple intervals.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância pode medir o tempo decorrido para um intervalo ou o total de tempo decorrido em vários intervalos.

trans-unit.source: In a typical <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> scenario, you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method, then eventually call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method, and then you check elapsed time using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em um típico <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> cenário, você chama o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método, chame eventualmente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método e, em seguida, verifique o tempo decorrido usando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance is either running or stopped; use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsRunning%2A> to determine the current state of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância está em execução ou parado; use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsRunning%2A> para determinar o estado atual de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> to begin measuring elapsed time; use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> to stop measuring elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> para começar a medir o tempo decorrido; use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> para interromper a medir o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Query the elapsed time value through the properties <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de tempo decorrido através das propriedades de consulta <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You can query the elapsed time properties while the instance is running or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Você pode consultar as propriedades de tempo decorrido, enquanto a instância está em execução ou parado.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Durante o tempo decorrido propriedades aumentarem continuamente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> está em execução; eles permanecem constantes quando a instância é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: By default, the elapsed time value of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance equals the total of all measured time intervals.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o valor de tempo decorrido de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância é igual ao total de todos os intervalos de tempo medido.

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> começa a contar ao tempo decorrido cumulativo; cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> termina a medição de intervalo atual e congela o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em existente <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> measures elapsed time by counting timer ticks in the underlying timer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> mede o tempo decorrido pela contagem de tiques de timer no mecanismo de temporizador subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class uses that counter to measure elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Se o hardware instalado e o sistema operacional de um contador de desempenho de alta resolução, oferecer suporte a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe usa esse contador para medir o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class uses the system timer to measure elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe usa o timer do sistema para medir o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> fields to determine the precision and resolution of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timing implementation.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> campos para determinar a precisão e a resolução do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> implementação de tempo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class assists the manipulation of timing-related performance counters within managed code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe auxilia a manipulação de contadores de desempenho relacionado à temporização do código gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> field and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> method can be used in place of the unmanaged Win32 APIs `QueryPerformanceFrequency` and `QueryPerformanceCounter`.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> campo e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> método pode ser usado no lugar das APIs do Win32 não gerenciado `QueryPerformanceFrequency` e `QueryPerformanceCounter`.

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor computer, it does not matter which processor the thread runs on.
trans-unit.target: Em um computador multiprocessador, não importa qual processador que o thread é executado no.

trans-unit.source: However, because of bugs in the BIOS or the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL), you can get different timing results on different processors.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, devido a erros no BIOS ou a camada de abstração de Hardware (HAL), você pode obter resultados diferentes em processadores diferentes.

trans-unit.source: To specify processor affinity for a thread, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread.ProcessorAffinity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar a afinidade do processador para um segmento, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread.ProcessorAffinity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class to determine the execution time for an application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe para determinar o tempo de execução para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class to calculate performance data.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o uso da <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe para calcular os dados de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance is stopped, and the elapsed time property of the instance is zero.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância é interrompida e a propriedade de tempo decorrido da instância é zero.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method to begin measuring elapsed time with the new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método para começar a medir o tempo decorrido com o novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.StartNew%2A> method to initialize a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance and immediately start it.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.StartNew%2A> método para inicializar uma nova <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância e inicie-o imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance by using a simple class constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir inicializa um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância usando o construtor de classe simples.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tempo total decorrido, medido pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> somente leitura que representa o tempo total decorrido, medido pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: In a typical <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> scenario, you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method, then eventually call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method, and then you check elapsed time using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em um típico <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> cenário, você chama o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método, chame eventualmente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método e, em seguida, verifique o tempo decorrido usando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property to retrieve the elapsed time value using <xref:System.TimeSpan> methods and properties.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> valor de propriedade para recuperar o tempo decorrido usando <xref:System.TimeSpan> métodos e propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can format the returned <xref:System.TimeSpan> instance into a text representation, or pass it to another class that requires a <xref:System.TimeSpan> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode formatar retornado <xref:System.TimeSpan> instância em uma representação de texto ou passá-lo para outra classe que requer um <xref:System.TimeSpan> parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: You can query the properties <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance is running or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Você pode consultar as propriedades <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> enquanto o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância está em execução ou parado.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Durante o tempo decorrido propriedades aumentarem continuamente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> está em execução; eles permanecem constantes quando a instância é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: By default, the elapsed time value of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance equals the total of all measured time intervals.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o valor de tempo decorrido de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância é igual ao total de todos os intervalos de tempo medido.

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> começa a contar ao tempo decorrido cumulativo; cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> termina a medição de intervalo atual e congela o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em existente <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property to determine the execution time for an application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> para determinar o tempo de execução para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tempo total decorrido, medido pela instância atual, em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: A read-only long integer representing the total number of milliseconds measured by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro longo somente leitura que representa o número total de milissegundos medidos pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This property represents elapsed time rounded down to the nearest whole millisecond value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o tempo decorrido arredondado para baixo para o valor de milissegundo inteiro mais próximo.

trans-unit.source: For higher precision measurements, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para medidas de precisão mais altas, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: You can query the properties <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance is running or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Você pode consultar as propriedades <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> enquanto o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância está em execução ou parado.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Durante o tempo decorrido propriedades aumentarem continuamente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> está em execução; eles permanecem constantes quando a instância é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: By default, the elapsed time value of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance equals the total of all measured time intervals.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o valor de tempo decorrido de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância é igual ao total de todos os intervalos de tempo medido.

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> começa a contar ao tempo decorrido cumulativo; cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> termina a medição de intervalo atual e congela o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em existente <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe para medir o desempenho de quatro implementações diferentes para analisar um número inteiro de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tempo total decorrido, medido pela instância atual, em tiques do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: A read-only long integer representing the total number of timer ticks measured by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro longo somente leitura que representa o número total de tiques do temporizador medidos pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the number of elapsed ticks in the underlying timer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o número de tiques decorridos em que o mecanismo subjacente do timer.

trans-unit.source: A tick is the smallest unit of time that the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer can measure.
trans-unit.target: Um tique é a menor unidade de tempo que o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer pode medir.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> field to convert the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> value into a number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> campo para converter o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> valor em um número de segundos.

trans-unit.source: You can query the properties <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance is running or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Você pode consultar as propriedades <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds%2A>, e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> enquanto o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância está em execução ou parado.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Durante o tempo decorrido propriedades aumentarem continuamente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> está em execução; eles permanecem constantes quando a instância é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: By default, the elapsed time value of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance equals the total of all measured time intervals.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o valor de tempo decorrido de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância é igual ao total de todos os intervalos de tempo medido.

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> começa a contar ao tempo decorrido cumulativo; cada chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> termina a medição de intervalo atual e congela o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em existente <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> ticks are different from <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> tiques são diferentes das <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Each tick in the <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value represents one 100-nanosecond interval.
trans-unit.target: Cada tique no <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valor representa um intervalo de 100 nanossegundos.

trans-unit.source: Each tick in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> value represents the time interval equal to 1 second divided by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency>.
trans-unit.target: Cada tique no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks%2A> valor representa o intervalo de tempo igual a 1 segundo dividido pelo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency>.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe para medir o desempenho de quatro implementações diferentes para analisar um número inteiro de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the frequency of the timer as the number of ticks per second.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a frequência do temporizador como o número de tiques por segundo.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The timer frequency indicates the timer precision and resolution.
trans-unit.target: A frequência de timer indica a precisão de timer e resolução.

trans-unit.source: For example, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second equals a timer resolution of 500 nanoseconds per tick.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma frequência de timer de 2 milhões tiques por segundo é igual a uma resolução do timer de 500 nanossegundos por tique.

trans-unit.source: In other words, because one second equals 1 billion nanoseconds, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second is equivalent to 2 million ticks per 1 billion nanoseconds, which can be further simplified to 1 tick per 500 nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: Em outras palavras, como um segundo é igual a 1 bilhão nanossegundos, uma frequência de timer de 2 milhões de tiques por segundo é equivalente a 2 milhões de tiques por 1 bilhão nanossegundos, que podem ser simplificados para 1 tique por 500 nanossegundos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> value depends on the resolution of the underlying timing mechanism.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> valor depende da resolução do mecanismo de tempo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> value reflects the frequency of that counter.
trans-unit.target: Se o hardware instalado e o sistema operacional de um contador de desempenho de alta resolução, oferecer suporte a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> valor reflete a frequência de contador.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> value is based on the system timer frequency.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> valor é baseado na frequência de timer de sistema.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> frequency depends on the installed hardware and operating system, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> value remains constant while the system is running.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> frequência depende do hardware instalado e o sistema operacional, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Frequency> valor permanece constante enquanto o sistema está em execução.

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir exibe a frequência e a resolução de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current number of ticks in the timer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de tiques atual no mecanismo de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: A long integer representing the tick counter value of the underlying timer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro longo que representa o valor do contador de tiques do mecanismo de temporizador subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class uses a high-resolution performance counter, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> returns the current value of that counter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe usa um contador de desempenho de alta resolução, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> retorna o valor atual do contador.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class uses the system timer, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> returns the current <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> instance.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe usa o timer do sistema, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> retorna atual <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade o <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> method to update a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o uso do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp%2A> para atualizar um contador de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o temporizador é baseado em um contador de desempenho de alta resolução.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The timer used by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class depends on the system hardware and operating system.
trans-unit.target: O timer usado pela <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe depende do hardware do sistema e o sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> is `true` if the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> é `true` se o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer baseia-se em um contador de desempenho de alta resolução.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> is `false`, which indicates that the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer is based on the system timer.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.IsHighResolution> é `false`, que indica que o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer se baseia o timer do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir exibe a frequência e a resolução de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> timer is running.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o temporizador de <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> está em execução.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> instance is currently running and measuring elapsed time for an interval; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a instância de <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> estiver em execução e medindo o tempo decorrido com relação a um intervalo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance begins running with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.StartNew%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância começa a execução com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.StartNew%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The instance stops running with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As paradas de instância em execução com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a medida de intervalo de tempo e redefine o tempo decorrido para zero.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância calcula e retém o tempo decorrido cumulativo em vários intervalos de tempo, até que a instância seja redefinida.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> para interromper a medição de intervalo atual e mantenha o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> parar qualquer medida de intervalo em andamento e limpar o valor de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a medida de tempo de intervalo, redefine o tempo decorrido para zero e começa a medir o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset or restarted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância calcula e retém o tempo decorrido cumulativo em vários intervalos de tempo, até que a instância seja redefinida ou reiniciada.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> para interromper a medição de intervalo atual e mantenha o valor de tempo decorrido cumulativo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> parar qualquer medida de intervalo em andamento e limpar o valor de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Restart%2A> to stop current interval measurement and start a new interval measurement.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Restart%2A> para interromper a medição de intervalo atual e iniciar uma nova medida de intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.
trans-unit.target: Inicia ou retoma a medição do tempo decorrido de um intervalo.

trans-unit.source: In a typical <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> scenario, you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method, then eventually call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method, and then you check elapsed time using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em um típico <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> cenário, você chama o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método, chame eventualmente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método e, em seguida, verifique o tempo decorrido usando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Once started, a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer measures the current interval, in elapsed timer ticks, until the instance is stopped or reset.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez iniciada, um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> timer mede o intervalo atual, em tiques de timer decorrido, até que a instância é interrompida ou redefinir.

trans-unit.source: Starting a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> that is already running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> que é já em execução não alterar o estado do temporizador ou redefinir as propriedades de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance measures more than one interval, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância medidas mais de um intervalo, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método retoma a medição de tempo do valor atual de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância calcula e retém o tempo decorrido cumulativo em vários intervalos de tempo, até que a instância seja redefinida.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method before calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método antes de chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Restart%2A> method to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> with a single command.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Restart%2A> método <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> com um único comando.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method to start a timer that measures the execution time of an application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método para iniciar um temporizador que mede o tempo de execução de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> instance, sets the elapsed time property to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" />, define a propriedade de tempo decorrido como zero e começa a medir o tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> that has just begun measuring elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch" /> que acabou de iniciar a medição de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> constructor and then calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> on the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente a chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> construtor e, em seguida, chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> na nova instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe para medir o desempenho de quatro implementações diferentes para analisar um número inteiro de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> classe.

trans-unit.source: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.
trans-unit.target: Para a medição do tempo decorrido de um intervalo.

trans-unit.source: In a typical <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> scenario, you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> method, then eventually call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method, and then you check elapsed time using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em um típico <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> cenário, você chama o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> método, chame eventualmente o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método e, em seguida, verifique o tempo decorrido usando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Elapsed%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method ends the current time interval measurement.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método termina a medição de intervalo de tempo atual.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> that is not running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties.
trans-unit.target: Interrompendo um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> que é não está em execução não alterar o estado do temporizador ou redefinir as propriedades de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance measures more than one interval, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method is equivalent to pausing the elapsed time measurement.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância medidas mais de um intervalo, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método é equivalente ao pausar a medida de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada subsequente para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Start%2A> retoma a medição de tempo do valor atual de tempo decorrido.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instance.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Reset%2A> método para limpar o tempo decorrido cumulativo em um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> method to stop a timer that measures the execution time of an application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.Stop%2A> método para interromper um temporizador que mede o tempo de execução de um aplicativo.
